entry.title: FLASH FREEZE WARNING , Laurentides (Réserve faunique)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Periods of snow. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries at times heavy. High zero with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 5 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High zero with temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 20 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Clearing late in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 20 in the evening and minus 35 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
